channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ExpressVPN rolls out major Qt update to boost speed and unify desktop apps
item.description: ExpressVPN is overhauling its desktop apps with a new Qt-based framework. The update is now live on Linux and macOS – and Windows is next. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: HoneyBook CRM review 2026
item.description: HoneyBook stands out as a versatile CRM platform designed specifically for creative entrepreneurs and small businesses. It excels in simplifying client management, automating workflows, and integrating essential business tools. While primarily focused on creative industries, its intuitive interface and continual improvements make it a valuable asset for most small businesses....

item.title: Bose QC Ultra Earbuds (2e Gen) : ces écouteurs à l’ANC inégalée sont à prix cassé pour Noël
item.description: La seconde itération des QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds de Bose, n’est pas une simple mise à jour cosmétique : c’est une piqûre de rappel sur ce que la marque sait faire de mieux. De quoi glisser ces écouteurs dans la hotte du Père Noël à 229 euros au lieu de 299 euros chez Boulanger, avec retrait en magasin sous 1 heure ou livraison dès le 23 décembre. ...

item.title: Bosses are getting tired of AI at work, and preferring to hire humans for "specialist" roles once again
item.description: AI perception is still torn, but the fact is that companies are shifting their hiring strategies rather than fully displacing human workers.

item.title: Currys has slashed the prices on all its PS5 consoles just in time for Christmas
item.description: Currys has discounted the price of PS5 Slim and PS5 Pro consoles drastically right before Christmas. Our article highlights the best deals at the retailer right now.

item.title: Agile CRM review 2026
item.description: Agile CRM is a feature-rich all-in-one CRM solution that caters to the needs of small and medium-sized businesses. With its affordable pricing plans and a wide range of tools for sales, marketing, and customer service, it provides good value for money. But the lack of consistent support, combined with a dated interface, hampers usability. There are competitors who do all of this with better execution, but not necessarily at a cheaper price point....

item.title: C’est une première dans l’histoire : une femme en fauteuil roulant va aller dans l’espace cet après-midi
item.description: Pour la première fois de l'histoire, une femme en fauteuil roulant va être envoyée dans l'espace ce jeudi 18 décembre. Michaela Benthaus doit partir à bord d'une fusée pour une mission suborbitale.

item.title: These Amazon Luna gaming bundle deals could save your wallet this Christmas at better than half price discounts
item.description: Christmas shopping sorted — these Amazon Luna gaming bundles are better than half price right now.

item.title: Sony settles with Tencent over 'slavish' Horizon clone
item.description: Earlier this year Sony sued Tencent for copyright infringement over its Light of Motiram game, calling it a "slavish clone" of Horizon Zero Dawn. Then, earlier this month, Tencent agreed to stop promoting and publicly testing the game. Now, the two companies have reached a "confidential settlement" and the case has been dismissed, according to court documents seen by The Verge. Light of Motiram has also disappeared from Steam and Epic's game stores. "SIE and Tencent are pleased to have reached a confidential resolution and will have no further public comment on this matter," Tencent's spokesp...

item.title: ‘Star Wars’ Day Was Disney’s Biggest Streaming Day of the Year
item.description: 'The Mandalorian' also joined the billion-hours-streamed club, but what does it all mean?

item.title: 10 Best Protein Powders, According to 2 Years of Testing (2026)
item.description: We found the best protein powders that won’t make your shake taste like drywall.

item.title: A Filmmaker Made a Sam Altman Deepfake—and Got Unexpectedly Attached
item.description: The director of Deepfaking Sam Altman created a “Sam Bot” when he couldn’t get an interview with the OpenAI CEO. Watch an exclusive trailer for the documentary, which comes out in January.

item.title: Emily in Paris season 5 dedication explained: who is Diego Borella?

item.title: From SaaS to AI: the technological and cultural shifts leaders must confront
item.description: AI adoption requires more than technology — it demands cultural leadership that addresses fear and builds confidence.

item.title: Apple opens iOS to third-party app stores in Japan
item.description: Apple has announced the changes it's making to the iOS App Store in Japan in order to comply with recent legislation in the country. It will allow third-party app stores and payment processing options, though is introducing new commission fees for those transactions. Developers in Japan will now be able to distribute apps on alternative […]

item.title: iOS 26.3 is now out in beta – here are 3 new features to expect on your iPhone soon
item.description: The first iOS 26.3 beta includes new weather wallpapers, an easier way to switch to Android, and the framework for another new feature.

item.title: iPhone Air 2 : Apple corrigerait deux gros défauts du premier modèle
item.description: L’iPhone Air n’a clairement pas trouvé son public, mais Apple ne semble pas prêt à tirer un trait sur le format ultra-fin. Un iPhone Air 2 serait déjà à l’étude, avec des changements importants.

item.title: Get this speedy Crucial X9 2TB Portable SSD for £105.99 at Amazon
item.description: The Crucial X9 2TB Portable SSD is discounted down to £105.99 at Amazon but it's a limited-time deal

item.title: Le Wi-Fi 7 absent sur les futurs iPhone 17e et MacBook pas chers d’Apple : la puce N1 sera toujours un luxe en 2026
item.description: L'adoption du Wi-Fi 7 dans le catalogue d'Apple semble se faire au ralenti. Comme le suggèrent les leaks sur les futurs produits Apple, la puce N1 ne sera pas déployée sur tous les nouveaux produits de la marque à la pomme et sera même réservée à ses fers de lance.

item.title: 15 Best Greens Powders (2025) Researched, Taste-Tested & Reviewed
item.description: We did the research (and taste-testing) to find the best greens powders worth your money. The Bloom Nutrition Superfood Greens Powder is our tried-and-true pick.

item.title: The UN just made a significant decision on who governs the Internet
item.description: The UN's Internet Governance Forum has gone from being an annual meeting to being a permanent UN body.

item.title: Google TV Freeplay adds even more free streaming channels, bringing its library total to over 250
item.description: Google expands its range of FAST entertainment and sports content, as well as adding more local news channels.

item.title: The Duffer Brothers use Stranger Things Funko dolls to hint at how the show ends
item.description: The Duffer Brothers appeared on "The Tonight Show" and used Funko dolls to give a clue as to how the show might end.

item.title: Avec 525 € en moins, ce laptop gaming sous RTX 5060 est le super deal de fin d’année pour jouer sans se ruiner
item.description: Envie d’une machine performante, fluide et réactive pour lancer vos jeux AAA, le tout sans vous ruiner ? Voici le Lenovo LOQ 15IRX10, un laptop avec RTX 5060 qui ne coûte plus que 874,99 euros, au lieu de 1 399,99 euros de base.

item.title: The Poco Pad X1 is an excellent budget tablet – but there's a problem
item.description: In the Poco Pad X1, Xiaomi has released a familiar but capable tablet at an appealing price – if you can find one.

item.title: Free : mauvaise nouvelle, la facture augmente discrètement pour les abonnés
item.description: C'est un changement passé inaperçu dans la nouvelle brochure tarifaire de l'opérateur. Depuis ce mercredi, Free a revu à la hausse les frais facturés aux clients qui décident de partir, tout en serrant la vis sur les retards de paiement.

item.description: Remotely locking your Windows 11 PC is now possible using an Android phone thanks to updated app – here's how to get it.

item.title: « Je comprends enfin les pliants », MKBHD a acheté un Galaxy Z TriFold et il est séduit par le format
item.description: Marques Brownlee (MKBHD) a mis la main sur le Samsung Galaxy TriFold et son verdict est intéressant : « C'est un appareil qui commence vraiment à donner du sens aux pliants ».

item.title: Pourquoi la consommation de charbon ne baisse pas dans le monde malgré l’explosion du renouvelable
item.description: L’année 2025 touchant à sa fin, l’heure est au bilan. Et le tableau dressé est peu réjouissant pour notre planète qui, selon un nouveau rapport, serait restée fortement dépendante du charbon durant 2025. Si la responsabilité est partagée par de nombreux pays, la Chine est particulièrement pointée du doigt en raison de son influence sur le marché mondial. ...

item.title: Wear my brand: Why branded merch is the next post-ironic trend
item.description: Fast casual restaurant chains are turning to merch, fashion, perfumes, apparel—and to fans, it’s no joke. You’ve probably seen them: clutch purses designed to look like croissants, anime-inspired hot sauce gear, purposefully ketchup-stained shirts, and even fried chicken perfumes. It seems like many of our favorite food brands are betting on merch, with surprisingly effective results. ...

item.title: ACT! CRM review 2026
item.description: ACT! CRM stands out with its long-standing reputation and adaptability to various business needs and industries. It provides a robust set of features including contact management, sales automation, and marketing tools. While the interface may feel outdated due to the lingering presence of its legacy design, the software's regular updates and integration capabilities make it a smart and reliable choice for SMBs....

item.title: Volkswagen lance l’arme secrète de ses petites voitures électriques : voici pourquoi elles pourraient devenir moins chères
item.description: Volkswagen continue de préparer le lancement de ses petites voitures électriques, prévues pour 2026, et annonce un cap important : le démarrage de son usine de batteries en Allemagne, avec des cellules innovantes.

item.title: Amazon déjoue une cyberattaque russe qui fait des ravages depuis 2021
item.description: Amazon indique avoir contrecarré une cyberattaque provenant de la Russie. Depuis 2021, des hackers russes se sont en effet infiltrés dans des infrastructures critiques en Occident, allant de l’énergie aux télécoms.

item.title: Cette fonction très pratique arrive sur montres connectées et on se demande pourquoi Google n’y a pas pensé plus tôt
item.description: Google a mis à jour son application Localiser pour la rendre disponible sur les montres Wear OS. Un bon moyen de retrouver facilement son smartphone ou de le signaler perdu.

item.description: No matter which megacorp emerges as the studio's new owner, the Warner Bros. Discovery boss will likely rake in hundreds of millions.

item.title: Phone Updates Used to Be Annoying. iOS 26 Is Awful
item.description: Is the latest iPhone operating system aesthetically appealing? No. But is it useful? Also no. At least I have company among the disgruntled.

item.title: BJ’s Wholesale Club is opening 9 new stores in 2026. Here’s the full list of locations coming soon
item.description: The membership-based warehouse chain just reported strong third-quarter 2025 earnings, and already added 12 new outposts this year. BJ’s Wholesale Club is planning to open nine new U.S. stores in 2026, and already debuted a new location on December 17 in Casselberry, Florida—its third in December alone, following openings in Springfield, Massachusetts, and Sumter, South Carolina....

item.title: Le rachat de Cowboy est acté : quelles conséquences pour les clients et actionnaires ?

item.title: The Game Awards announces an estimated 171 million global livestreams of the full broadcast, breaking the show's record for its 11th year
item.description: The Game Awards has announced that its 2025 ceremony broke viewership records with an estimated 171 million global livestreams of the full broadcast.
